actions.text: The previous question was ordered without objection.

VOTE POSTPONED - The yeas and nays were ordered on the resolutions, H.Res. 251 and H.Res. 252, offered en bloc. Pursuant to a previous announcement of the Chair, the vote was postponed until after 4:30 p.m.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 370 - 0 (Roll no. 260).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing that a message be sent to the Senate informing the Senate that the House of Representatives has adopted amendments to the articles of impeachment exhibited against Walter L. Nixon, Jr., a judge of the United States District Court for the Southern District of Mississippi.

summary.text: Provides for a message to be sent to the Senate informing the Senate that the House of Representatives has adopted amendments to the articles of impeachment exhibited against Walter L. Nixon, Jr., a judge of the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of Mississippi.

titles.title: Providing that a message be sent to the Senate informing the Senate that the House of Representatives has adopted amendments to the articles of impeachment exhibited against Walter L. Nixon, Jr., a judge of the United States District Court for the Southern District of Mississippi.
